entities.name: boggart
entities.description: A creature that can take on any form to frighten its victims. It is described as not remotely frightening when turned into half a slug.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: The teacher who is instructing the class on how to cast the riddikulus charm. He says that laughter is what really finishes a boggart and that the word alone is not enough.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A student in Professor Lupin's class who is chosen to practice the riddikulus charm. He is described as walking forward as though he were heading for the gallows.

relationships.description: The boggart is repelled by laughter, which is what really finishes it.
Professor Lupin is teaching Neville how to cast the riddikulus charm.
